price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ntabwo (kubagezaho ubutumwa) mbibasabira igihembo, ariko uzashaka gukurikira inzira imuganisha kwa Nyagasani we (yemerewe kugira icyo atanga mu nzira ya Allah ku bushake bwe).”
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul mā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin illā man shāa an yattakhidha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
